item.title: The CatNorth Catalog: Over 1.5 Million Reliable Quasar Candidates from Gaia DR3
item.description: Reposted from KIAA-PKU The Kavli Institute for Astronomy and Astrophysics at Peking University announces an advancement in cosmic exploration with the release of the CatNorth quasar candidate catalog, as recently published in The Astrophysical Journal Supplement Series.
